title: Does league work on a non- genuine copy of microsoft windows?
body:
Does league work on a non- genuine copy of microsoft windows?
If it does, will the non -genuine copy o windows affect gameplay?

replies.body:
Yes but you have to deal with the pop ups and if you click them in full screen mode it minimizes the game.

I had to play on non genuine windows 7 cause of an issue i was having recently but have recently gottwn it reactivated.

I would suggest using shift windows to keep your game full screen while in windowed mode so that accidentally clicking the pop ups doesnt minimize the game.
